page.title: 16Askham Bryan College.
page.content: Askham Bryan Agricultural and Horticultural College teaches male and female students.There are 450 full_time and 1200 part_time students. You must be 18 to study full_time and over 16 to work part_time.If you want to study full_time you have to take exams but part_time not necessarily. Only 220 live in the college. They do not get wages while they are there. They study Agriculture, Horticulture and Agricultural Engineering. They have to take tests and exams. They go on visits abroad to farms and to horticulture stations. When they leave they get agricultural and horticultural farming or engineering jobs. There are 77 lecturers and 170 other staff. A principal runs the college.
